channel.title: Cooking timer?
channel.description:
pi source 317 mtp v2
Ok i have cooking and if i have a full inv of raw food. and i use on the range it cooks it all in like 2 seconds. how can i make it go slower like itleast 10 seconds for a bag

@sonsofgod2 wrote:

if i use one of the foods in my invetory out of 27. it cooks all of the food withthin 2 seconds. i want the whole invetory to take itleast 10 second to cook it all.

Read full topic

item.title: Cooking timer?
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Your problem would be you are under writing your codes which gives you these problems in the game. You need to explain exactly what you want it to do, not just have a list of items that can be cooked… I’m not on my computer right now so I can’t give you the correct code but you can probably find it through the one and only search bar!

Read full topic

item.title: Cooking timer?
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Put in an actionTimer or a delay. Also, please try to keep your questions inside of one post. For example, the last post that said “solved” you would switch to UPDATE: cooking timer, or something like that. But I know that you probably did not know this, and so I have some sympathy for you. I would say to keep this post as is and just use the information I gave you for future reference.

Read full topic
